# Univariate plot
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
histf <- function(var){ggplot(data, aes(x=var))+geom_histogram()}
lapply(data,histf)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
boxf<- function(var){ggplot()+geom_boxplot(aes(y=var))}
lapply(data,boxf)

```

```{r}
summary(data)
```
